players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "I'm shocked and saddened by Alice's sudden demise. Let's all come together and try to figure out who could have done this."
You: "I'm thinking it's a good idea to ask people about their interactions with Alice last night."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob, we should all share our interactions with Alice last night to help in the investigation."
Diana: "I have nothing to hide, I was in my house last night and didn't interact with Alice at all. I hope this information helps in finding the true culprit behind her demise."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
